name: Obliviverse: Idle Adventures
description:
Get your walking shoes on cause it's time to save the Obliviverse! Traverse the realms with your team of heroes, mowing down an unending stream of villains to save all of space and time! Make new friends along the way and prepare your heroes for their next jump! Featuring a fantastic cast of heroes drawn from the Obliviverse, choose your own lineup of champions from Oblivion, Genesis and more to defend the universe against a litany of evil villains.

Launch Features
  • 14 Heroes
  • Incalculable waves of enemies to overcome
  • Infinite progression
  • Weekly free content drops
  • Limitless possibilities!
  • Relive the stories of old, facing Necrovol, Luca Blight, Bek'talith and more!

With beautiful animation hand designed by Bowie, Idle Adventures will never cease to entertain as you delve deeper into the story rich atmosphere of the Obliviverse and walk your way to victory! Even while you're off reading a book of checking out the latest episode of your favorite TV show, your heroes will keep on walking their way to the next loop!

Obliviverse: Idle Adventures is a feature rich evolution of the clicker / idler genre, allowing you to customize your heroes and play experience across the board. Your heroes gear, abilities and formation are only limited by your imagination and ability to CLICK!
